youNeedToAcceptTheResourcePack: %prefix%You need to accept the §6resource pack§7 to join the server!
timerHelp:
§6§lTimer §8| §7Help
§7/timer §8- §7Show current time
§7/timer pause §8- §7Pause the timer
§7/timer resume §8- §7Resume the timer
§7/timer reset §8- §7Reset the timer
§7/timer set <seconds> §8- §7Set the timer to a specific time
§7/timer add <seconds> §8- §7Increase the timer by a specific time
§7/timer remove <seconds> §8- §7Decrease the timer by a specific time
§7/timer get §8- §7Show current time
§7/timer mode <Countdown/Countup> §8- §7Set the timer mode
§7/timer setFirstColor <color> §8- §7Set the first color
§7/timer setSecondColor <color> §8- §7Set the second color
§7/timer bold <true/false> §8- §7Set the bold value
AllItemsDescription: Collect all items in the game in a random order
AmpelDescription: You must pay attention to the traffic light and stop at red
AmpelRotPhaseMillisNameDescription: The time in milliseconds the red phase lasts
AmpelGelbPhaseMillisNameDescription: The time in milliseconds the yellow phase lasts
GruenSchonPhaseSecsNameDescription: The time in seconds the green safe phase lasts (No yellow phase during this time)
WahrscheinlichkeitFuerVonGruenNachGelbNa: The probability in percent that the traffic light changes from green to yellow
BedrockWallDescription: Creates a wall of bedrock that appears behind you after a few seconds
BedrockWallSecondsDescription: Seconds until the bedrock wall appears behind you
ChunkBreaksDownDescription: The top layer of the chunk breaks down after a while
SecondsUntilChunkBreaksDownDescription: Seconds until the chunk breaks down
ElsaIceRadiusDescription: The radius in which ice generates
EveryBlockDisappearsDescription: Every block you interact with disappears from the entire chunk
FlagQuizDescription: You must guess the flag of a country
resolutionDescription: Change the resolution of the flag
MagnetDescription: All creatures within a certain radius are drawn to you
MagnetRangeDescription: The radius in which items are drawn to you
RandomBlockDropsDescription: Every block you want to mine drops a random item
RandomBlockDropsSaveDescription: Items are saved and always drop the same
RandomMLGDescription: You are teleported to a random height and must perform an MLG there
RandomMobInRandomBiomDescription: You must kill a random mob in a random biome, and you receive Pokéballs for support
RandomMobChillTimeDescription: Minutes until the first mob needs to be killed
RandomMobCatchTimeDescription: Minutes until the mob needs to be caught
TheFloorIsLavaDescription: Everything beneath you turns into lava after a while
TheFloorIsLavaSecondsLavaDescription: Seconds until the floor turns into lava
TheFloorIsLavaSecondsMagmaDescription: Seconds until the floor turns into magma
YCoordinateOnlyInOneDirectionName: Y Coordinate Only in One Direction
YCoordinateOnlyInOneDirectionDescription: You can only move in one direction
YCoordinateOnlyInOneDirectionDirectionDe: The direction in which you can move
TimeControlDescriptionItem: §7Click with the item in hand to pause or resume time
WolfiDescription: If your wolf dies, you die too! (When deactivating the challenge, your wolf is only deleted if it's loaded)
nameTagVisibleDescription: Should the wolf's name tag be visible
DamageMessagesGameRuleDescription: Shows a message when you or another player takes damage
damageGameRuleShowToAllPlayersDescriptio: Shows all players the damage you received or only to you
WinningConditionGameRuleDescription: When this condition is met, the challenge ends
winningConditionMobTypeDescription: Which mob needs to be killed
SyncInventoryGameRuleDescription: Synchronizes the inventory of all players
SyncXPGameRuleDescription: Synchronizes the XP of all players
SkipsGameRuleDescription: Number of skips a player has
AmountOfSkipsDescription: Number of skips a player has
